name: Summon Fireworks
description: Hold your secondary power to launch fireworks anywhere!

element.command: execute rotated as @s run summon firework_rocket ~ ~2 ~1 {LifeTime:3,Motion:[0d,5d,0d],shotAtAngle:1b,FireworksItem:{id:firework_rocket,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:{Flight:3,Explosions:[{Type:1,Flicker:1b,Trail:1b,Colors:[I;16711680]}]}}}}
